data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wang, Cheng, Peng, Xian-Jin (2014): Three species of Hitobia Kamura, 1992 (Araneae, Gnaphosidae) from south-west China. ZooKeys 464: 25-34, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.464.8403, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.464.8403
